009
010package imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters;
011
012import static imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters.TschumperleDericheF.kernelDx;
013import static imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters.TschumperleDericheF.kernelDy;
014
015import imagingbook.lib.filter.GenericFilter;
016import imagingbook.lib.filter.linear.GaussianFilterSeparable;
017import imagingbook.lib.filter.linear.LinearFilter;
018import imagingbook.lib.image.data.PixelPack;
019import imagingbook.lib.image.data.PixelPack.PixelSlice;
020import imagingbook.lib.math.Eigensolver2x2;
021import imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix;
022import imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters.TschumperleDericheF.Parameters;
023
024/**
025 * Complete rewrite from scratch
026 * 
027 * @version 2021/01/06
028 */
029
030public class TschumperleDericheFilter extends GenericFilter {
031
032        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
033        
034        private final Parameters params;
035        private int M;                          // image width
036        private int N;                          // image height
037        private int K;                          // number of color channels (any, but typ. 1 or 3)
038        
039        // temporary data
040        private PixelPack Dx, Dy;
041        private PixelPack G;            // structure matrix as (u,v) with 3 elements
042        
043        private GenericFilter filterDx, filterDy;
044        private GenericFilter gradientBlurFilter;
045        private GenericFilter structureBlurFilter;
046        
047        private int T;          // number of iterations
048        private float alpha;
049        private double a1, a2;
050        private PixelPack source, target;
051        
052        
053        public TschumperleDericheFilter() {
054                this(new Parameters());
055        }
056        
057        // constructor - use for setting individual parameters:
058        public TschumperleDericheFilter(Parameters params) {
059                this.params = params;
060        }
061        
062        @Override
063        protected void initFilter(PixelPack source, PixelPack target) { // called by {@link GenericFilter}
064                this.source = source;
065                this.target = target;
066                
067                this.M = source.getWidth(); 
068                this.N = source.getHeight(); 
069                this.K = source.getDepth();
070                
071                this.T = params.iterations;
072                this.alpha = params.initialAlpha;
073                this.a1 = params.a1;
074                this.a2 = params.a2;
075                
076                this.Dx = new PixelPack(source, false); // container for X/Y-derivatives
077                this.Dy = new PixelPack(source, false);
078                
079                this.filterDx = new LinearFilter(kernelDx);
080                this.filterDy = new LinearFilter(kernelDy);
081                
082                this.gradientBlurFilter = new GaussianFilterSeparable(params.sigmaG);   
083                this.structureBlurFilter = new GaussianFilterSeparable(params.sigmaS);
084                
085                this.G = new PixelPack(M, N, 3, null);  // structure matrix as (u,v) with 3 elements    
086        }
087        
088        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
089        
090        @Override
091        protected void runPass(PixelPack source, PixelPack target) {
092                makeGradients();                                                        // Step 1
093                makeStructureMatrix();                                          // Step 2
094                float maxVelocity = updateVelocities();         // Step 3
095                alpha = (float) params.dt / maxVelocity;        // Step 4: re-adjust alpha
096        }
097        
098        // ------------------------------------------------------------
099        
100        private void makeGradients() {
101                source.copyTo(Dx);
102                filterDx.applyTo(Dx);
103                gradientBlurFilter.applyTo(Dx);
104                
105                source.copyTo(Dy);
106                filterDy.applyTo(Dy);
107                gradientBlurFilter.applyTo(Dy);
108        }
109        
110        private void makeStructureMatrix() {    // make G
111                for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
112                        for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
113                                final float[] dx = Dx.getPixel(u, v);
114                                final float[] dy = Dy.getPixel(u, v);
115                                float a = 0; float b = 0; float c = 0;
116                                for (int k = 0; k < K; k++) {
117                                        final float fx = dx[k];
118                                        final float fy = dy[k];
119                                        a += fx * fx;
120                                        b += fx * fy;
121                                        c += fy * fy;
122                                }
123                                G.setPixel(u, v, a, b, c);
124                        }
125                }
126                structureBlurFilter.applyTo(G);
127        }
128
129        private float updateVelocities() {
130                float maxV = Float.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;   // maximum velocity
131                for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
132                        for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
133                                // calculate the local geometry matrix A(u,v), which has only 3 distinct elements
134                                float[] A = getGeometryMatrix(u, v);
135                                float[] B = new float[K];                       // local velocities for K channels                      
136                                for (int k = 0; k < K; k++) {
137                                        float[] H = getHessianMatrix(k, u, v); // local Hessian for channel k at pos u,v (3 elements)
138                                        float vel = A[0] * H[0] + 2 * A[1] * H[1] + A[2] * H[2]; // = trace (A*H)
139                                        B[k] = vel;
140                                        maxV = Math.max(maxV, Math.abs(vel)); // find max absolute velocity for time-step adaptation
141                                }
142                                
143                                // update the image (result goes to target)
144                                float[] p = source.getPixel(u, v);
145                                for (int k = 0; k < K; k++) {
146                                        p[k] = p[k] + alpha * B[k];     // we use alpha from the previous pass!
147                                }
148                                //source.setPixel(u, v, Inew);
149                                target.setPixel(u, v, p);
150                        }
151                }
152                return maxV;
153        }
154        
155        private float[] getGeometryMatrix(int u, int v) {
156                float[] Guv = G.getPixel(u, v); // 3 elements of local geometry matrix (2x2)
157                
158                // calculate the 2 eigenvalues lambda1, lambda2 and the greater eigenvector e1
159                Eigensolver2x2 solver = new Eigensolver2x2(Guv[0], Guv[1], Guv[1], Guv[2]);
160                if (!solver.isReal()) {
161                        throw new RuntimeException("undefined eigenvalues in " + 
162                                        this.getClass().getSimpleName());
163                }
164                double lambda1 = solver.getEigenvalue1();
165                double lambda2 = solver.getEigenvalue2();
166                double[] evec1 = solver.getEigenvector1();
167                normalize(evec1);               
168                double arg = 1.0 + lambda1 + lambda2;   // 1 + lambda_1 + lambda_2
169                float c1 = (float) Math.pow(arg, -a1);
170                float c2 = (float) Math.pow(arg, -a2);
171                
172                // mount geometry matrix:
173                float ex = (float) evec1[0];
174                float ey = (float) evec1[1];
175                float exx = ex * ex;
176                float exy = ex * ey;
177                float eyy = ey * ey;
178                
179                float A0 = c1 * eyy + c2 * exx;
180                float A1 = (c2 - c1)* exy;
181                float A2 = c1 * exx + c2 * eyy;
182                return new float[] {A0, A1, A2};
183        }
184
185        
186        // Calculate the Hessian matrix Hk for channel k at position (u,v)
187        private float[] getHessianMatrix(int k, int u, int v) {
188                float[] Hk = new float[3];
189                PixelSlice Ik = source.getSlice(k);
190                float icc = Ik.getVal(u, v);
191                Hk[0] = Ik.getVal(u-1,v) + Ik.getVal(u+1,v) - 2 * icc;                                                          // = H_xx(u,v)
192                Hk[1] = 0.25f * (Ik.getVal(u-1,v-1) + Ik.getVal(u+1,v+1) - Ik.getVal(u-1,v+1) - Ik.getVal(u+1,v-1));    // = H_xy(u,v)
193                Hk[2] = Ik.getVal(u,v+1) + Ik.getVal(u,v-1) - 2 * icc;                                                          // = H_yy(u,v)
194                return Hk;
195        }
196        
197        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
198        
199        private void normalize(double[] vec) {
200                double norm = Matrix.normL2(vec);
201                if (norm > 1E-6) {
202                        for (int i = 0; i < vec.length; i++) {
203                                vec[i] = vec[i] / norm;
204                        }
205                }
206        }
207        
208        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
209        
210        @Override
211        protected final int passesRequired() {
212                return T;       // this filter needs T passes
213        }
214        
215        @Override
216        // cleanup temporary data (probably unnecessary)
217        protected void closeFilter() {
218                this.Dx = null;
219                this.Dy = null;
220                this.G = null;
221        }
222
223}
224
